original_text: Because you disheartened the righteous with your lies, when I had brought them no grief, and because you encouraged the wicked not to turn from their evil ways and so save their lives,
korean_text: 내가 슬프게 하지 아니한 의인의 마음을 너희가 거짓말로 근심하게 하며 너희가 또 악인의 손을 굳게 하여 그 악한 길에서 돌이켜 떠나 삶을 얻지 못하게 하였은즉

sentences.original_text: Because you disheartened the righteous with your lies
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 거짓말로 의로운 자들을 낙심시켰기 때문에

sentences.original_text: when I had brought them no grief
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들에게 슬픔을 주지 않았을 때

sentences.original_text: and because you encouraged the wicked
not to turn from their evil ways
